abstract: Lawyers from FanDuel and DraftKings argue in New York State Supreme Court that their games are not gambling because they involve more skill than luck.
lead_paragraph: At issue is whether daily fantasy sports contests are games of skill, or games of chance — and therefore run afoul of New York State gambling laws.

headline.main: Judge Hears Arguments on Fantasy Sports
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Fantasy Sports; Websites Get Their Day in Court

snippet: At issue is whether daily fantasy sports contests are games of skill, or games of chance — and therefore run afoul of New York State gambling laws.
